## Welcome
I study how **environmental conditions** and **species interactions** shape **infection dynamics**, and I teach **General Biology**, **Biostatistics**, and **Evolution, Disease, and Medicine** (undergrad & grad). This site shares **safe, high-level teasers** of ongoing work and practical teaching resources.
